info.title: LeadOn's Corp - GameOn! API
info.description: This API goal is to monitor players performance across multiple games.

get.summary: Get data used in home page of GameOn! front-end.

200.description: Home data, dynamicaly calculated depending on connected user.

get.description: Get game played by ID with its team players and highlights.

delete.description: Delete game in database (including highlights / team-players). WARNING: it really deletes!

get.description: Get future gamses to be played by user.
Get last games played with their players.

get.summary: Get last games played by player.
get.description: Get last games played by player with their team members.

post.summary: Declares score of a game in database.

get.summary: Get all FIFA Teams in database.

post.description: Creates a highlight in database that is linked to a FIFA Game Played.

get.summary: Get last games played by summoner.

404.description: Player not found / no Riot Games PUUID found.

post.summary: Update Match information (retrieve data from Riot Games).

get.summary: Get all gaming platforms in database.

get.description: Gets current user profile as stored in database. If the user account doesn't exists, it creates it automatically.

patch.description: Updates current user profile in database.

get.summary: Get a player by its ID.
get.description: Get a player by its ID, and retrieve its information.

patch.description: Updates user profile in database, only for admins.

get.summary: Get all stats of a user.
get.description: Get all statistics for each platform of a user.

get.summary: Get player's profile picture from server.
Get all League of Legends players in database.
Get a summoner by its ID.
get.description: Get a summoner by its ID, and retrieve its information.

patch.summary: Update user League of Legends summoner.

get.summary: Get summoner League of Legends history.

patch.summary: Update current user League of Legends summoner.
Update user League of Legends profile.

get.summary: Get all featured tournaments in database.
Get tournament by ID in database.
Check if player is subscribed to a tournament.

404.description: Player not subscribed / tournament not found.

post.summary: Make Tournament to go into phase 1.

404.description: Player not subscribed / tournament not found.
